description:
The Director of Engineering will lead and grow the Cloud SQL team. You are a technical professional and will have technical leaders to support you. You will collaborate closely with partner teams and customers to drive the business to success. You will also help drive the product end-to-end, from developing deep insights into customer needs, to working at the detail level on features, architecture and design, to meeting service level objectives.

You will bring an understanding of software to the evolving and growing nature of our business. Success in the role will require an understanding of database systems and deep knowledge of how distributed storage products are built for the cloud.

Working in this team will expose you to both building a complex Cloud Service and managing a hyper-scale business within Google Cloud.

Cloud SQL is Google Cloud Platform's managed relational database service and is of strategic importance to Google Cloud. Cloud SQL is one of the fastest growing services in Google Cloud Platform today, and we are seeing this growth accelerate as enterprises start migrating more of their mission critical workloads to Cloud. Building upon Google’s leadership in infrastructure (compute, networking, storage, security) and in large scale data management (Spanner, Big Query, Bigtable), we are developing the best data management platform for customers to run their workloads.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science or equivalent practical experience.
  • People management experience leading a technical team.
  • Experience with relational databases, systems software, and cloud technologies.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Cloud product development experience managing timelines and multiple stakeholders.
  • Experience with mission-critical database applications and an understanding and appreciation for the challenges associated with enterprise migrations and IT operations.
  • Experience inspiring followership through the ability to lead by example.
  • Proven track record of hiring great people and growing technical talent.
  • Ability to present complex technical concepts to technical and non-technical audiences.
  • Ability to deliver against product deliverables in ambiguous environments.
responsibilities:
• Deepen product in key areas including performance, manageability, replication/reliability and expand product portfolio horizontally.
  • Develop relationships with enterprise customers to address technical- and/or service-related gaps to provide a more holistic and database technology platform.
  • Partner and help drive great cross-functional relationships with internal leadership, stakeholders, and partners to help create SQL products for the Cloud.
  • Grow and scale a strong engineering organization that will be capable of supporting the growth of the technology portfolio and enterprise customer base.
  • Develop and own the appropriate roadmap and strategy while prioritizing pre-existing initiatives to drive multifold returns for the Cloud business broadly and the production teams specifically.
title: Director of Engineering, Cloud SQL
